subject: Programming
title: Grace Hopper the Queen of Code
description: A micro-lesson that makes Grace Hopper the Queen of Code usable.

hook.text: Grace Hopper invented the compiler and told an entire industry it was wrong about programming.

buildup.text: She believed humans shouldn't adapt to machines â€” machines should understand human words.

discovery.text: Her compiler translated English-like commands into machine code, opening programming to non-experts.

twist.text: Her superiors told her it was impossible. She built it anyway and proved them wrong repeatedly.

climax.text: Hopper rose to Rear Admiral in the Navy and became one of the most honored computer scientists ever.
